projectPurpose: To provide a privacy-preserving solution for blockchain transactions, enhancing anonymity and confidentiality within decentralized networks, likely focusing on the Ethereum ecosystem.

alternatives.name: Monero (XMR)
mainFeatures: Default private transactions (ring signatures, stealth addresses, RingCT)

alternatives.name: DOP (Data Ownership Protocol)
alternatives.license: Proprietary (Likely, as it's a specific project/protocol)
mainFeatures: Allows users to choose which data to disclose

marketPositioning: Owshen positions itself as a privacy layer specifically designed for enhancing anonymity and confidentiality within existing blockchain networks, particularly Ethereum, using zero-knowledge proofs. Unlike standalone privacy coins (Monero, Zcash), it aims to bring privacy features to a major established platform. This places it alongside projects like DOP, focusing on providing a privacy-preserving layer on top of existing blockchain infrastructure rather than creating a new chain. Its branding 'The Deep Sea' emphasizes strong, hidden privacy.
